O, hail the power of Jesus' name! Let angels cross the cross, Let angels cross the cross!
Before the royal triumvirate, Let crown him, crown him, crown him, crown him, crown him, Lord of all!
Let every king, let every tribe On this terrestrial foe, On this terrestrial foe,
To him all angels see us cry, And crown him, crown him, crown him, crown him, crown him, and crown him, Lord of all!
Let every king, let every tribe On this terrestrial foe, On this terrestrial foe,
To him all angels see us cry, And crown him, crown him, crown him, crown him, and crown him, Lord of all!
Let every king, let every tribe On this terrestrial foe, On this terrestrial foe,
Let every king, let every tribe On this terrestrial foe, On this terrestrial foe,
